titles: The oath of every free-man of the city of London
author: City of London (England).
publisher: Printed by James Flesher, printer to this honourable city,
notes: Title of second sheet: Instructions for every free-man of the city of London.
"You shall sweare, that ye shall be true and faithfull to the Common-wealth of England; and in"--first three lines of text.
Copy torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Loyalty oaths --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1642-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
